channel.title: Baser on The Amateur Data Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in Baser on The Amateur Data Scientist

item.title: Wrangling and Manipulation of Monthly Philippine Consumer Price Index
item.description: 1 More Paths, More Knowledge 2 Extension of data.frame 3 Where | Order By, Select | Update, Group By 4 Monthly Philippine Consumer Price Index 1994 Jan to 2018 Jun 4.1 Finagler 5 Code 6 References 1 More Paths, More Knowledge In a series of posts, I discussed how I turned a messy data, the monthly Philippine consumer price index to tidy data, using packages and functions in the tidyverse.
